aimtune.title: Aim Tune
aimtune.description: A site where you can convert your sensitivity across different games, keeping your aim consistent!

raku.title: Raku - Japanese Cuisine
raku.description: Raku is a project about Japanese cuisine, developed using JavaScript, Bootstrap, and jQuery. The page offers an overview of typical dishes with a simple and intuitive interface. Bootstrap ensures responsive design and jQuery provides dynamic interactivity.

visionaire.title: Visionaire - Landing Page
visionaire.description: The Visionaire landing page was developed using JavaScript, SASS and a design created in Figma. The project aims to attractively and functionally present Visionaire’s services, focusing on usability and modern aesthetics.

bio.title: About Me
bio.description: Hi, I’m Matheus. I’m training to be a Full-Stack Developer at EBAC. Right now, I’m focused on getting better at Front-End, making interfaces that look good and are easy to use. I like learning new tools to improve my projects. I’m hardworking, enjoy working with others, and like challenges that need creativity and smart solutions. I prefer fast-paced workplaces where we can build real results.
